meanings.definition: The ability to recover quickly from difficulties.
meanings.sent1: Her resiliency helped her bounce back from the tough situation.
meanings.sent2: The team showed great resiliency in overcoming the challenges they faced.
meanings.sent3: His resiliency was like a superhero power, always saving the day.
meanings.sent4: The resiliency of the tree branches in the storm was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The resiliency of the rubber band made it stretch and snap back effortlessly.

meanings.definition: The capacity to withstand stress and bounce back from adversity.
meanings.sent1: The resiliency of the material allowed it to endure extreme pressure.
meanings.sent2: She admired his resiliency in handling difficult situations with ease.
meanings.sent3: The resiliency of the old car surprised everyone as it kept running smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The resiliency of the athlete's spirit shone through in every competition.
meanings.sent5: The resiliency of the community was evident in their quick recovery after the disaster.
